contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox road |state=OH |type=SR |route=561 |length_mi=7.11 |length_round=2 |length_ref=<ref name="sld">{{cite web |url=http://www.odotonline.org/techservapps/SLD/default.htm |title=Technical Services Straight Line Diagrams |author=[[Ohio Department of Transportation]] |accessdate=April 30, 2010}}</ref> |established=1938 |direction_a=South |terminus_a={{Jct|state=OH|US|50}} in [[Cincinnati, Ohio|Cincinnati]] |junction={{Jct|state=OH|I|71}} in [[Norwood, Ohio|Norwood]] |direction_b=North |terminus_b=Vine Street in [[Cincinnati, Ohio|Cincinnati]] |counties=[[Hamilton County, Ohio|Hamilton]] |previous_type=SR |previous_route=560 |next_type=SR |next_route=562 }} '''State Route 561 (SR 561)''' is a north–south [[state highway]] in the southwestern portion of the [[U.S. state]] of [[Ohio]]. Its southern terminus is at [[U.S. Route 50 (Ohio)|U.S. Route 50]] approximately {{convert|9|mi|km}} east of Downtown [[Cincinnati, Ohio|Cincinnati]] – this point also serves as the western termini for both [[State Route 32 (Ohio)|State Route 32]] and [[State Route 125 (Ohio)|State Route 125]]; the route’s northern terminus is at its intersection with [[State Route 4 (Ohio)|State Route 4]]. The route takes many different names along its length, being first known as Linwood Avenue, Observatory Avenue, and Edwards Road in Cincinnati; then it is named Smith Road and Carthage Avenue as it passes through [[Norwood, Ohio|Norwood]]; its final stretch in Cincinnati once again is as Seymour Avenue. ==Route description== No part of SR 561 in Ohio is included as a part of the [[National Highway System (United States)|National Highway System]] (NHS).<ref name="NHS map of Ohio">{{cite map | title=National Highway System: Ohio | date=December 2003 | publisher=[[Federal Highway Administration]] | url=http://www.fhwa.dot.gov/planning/nhs/maps/oh/cincinnati_oh.pdf | format=PDF|accessdate=March 27, 2012}}</ref> The NHS is a network of highways that are identified as being most important for the economy, mobility and defense of the nation.<ref name=NHS>{{cite web |url=http://www.fhwa.dot.gov/planning/nhs/ |title=National Highway System |accessdate=March 27, 2012 |date= August 26, 2010 |publisher=Federal Highway Administration}}</ref> SR 561 heads north from the southern terminus at an interchange with US 50. The route heads northwest turning north towards [[Interstate 71 in Ohio|Interstate 71]]. After I–71, the road has an short concurrency with [[U.S. Route 22 in Ohio|US 22]]/[[Ohio State Route 3|SR 3]] in [[Norwood, Ohio|Norwood]]. The road heads towards the northern terminus at Vine Street, passing through a traffic light at SR 4 (Paddock Road) just south of exit 9 of [[Interstate 75 in Ohio|I–75]].<ref name="googleA">{{google maps |url=http://maps.google.com/maps?hl=en&hl=en&tab=nl |title=Overview of OH 561 |accessdate=March 27, 2012}}</ref> ==History== * '''1938''' – Original route certified; originally routed from {{convert|2|mi|km}} north of its current southern terminus to [[U.S. Route 42 (Ohio)|U.S. Route 42]].<ref name=ohhwys>[http://pages.prodigy.net/john.simpson/highways/561.html Route 561] (The Unofficial Ohio State Highways Web Site) by John Simpson</ref> * '''1941''' – Extended south to its current terminus on a former segment of [[U.S. Route 50 (Ohio)|U.S. Route 50]].<ref name=ohhwys/> * '''1947''' – Northern terminus moved to {{convert|1|mi|km|adj=on}} north of [[State Route 4 (Ohio)]] along a previously unnumbered road.<ref name=ohhwys/> ==Major intersections== {{Jcttop|state=OH|county=Hamilton|length_ref=<ref name=sld />}} {{OHint |location=Cincinnati |mile=0.00 |road={{Jct|state=OH|US|50|OH|32|OH|125|dir2=east|dir3=east}} |notes=Southern terminus of SR 561}} {{OHint |location=Norwood |lspan=3 |mile=3.08 |road={{Jct|state=OH|I|71}}}} {{OHint |type=mplex |mile=4.18 |road={{Jct|state=OH|US|22|OH|3|dir1=west|dir2=south}} |notes=Southern end of US 22/SR 3 concurrency}} {{OHint |type=mplex |mile= |road={{Jct|state=OH|US|22|OH|3|dir1=east|dir2=north}} |notes=Northern end of US 22/SR 3 concurrency}} {{OHint |location=Cincinnati |lspan=3 |mile=5.99 |road={{Jct|state=OH|US|42|name1=Reading Road}}}} {{OHint |mile=6.80 |road={{Jct|state=OH|OH|4|I|75|to2=to|name1=Paddock Road}}}} {{OHint |mile=7.11 |road=Vine Street |notes=Northern terminus of SR 561}} {{legendRJL}} ==References== {{reflist}} ==External links== *[http://www.state-ends.com/ohio/oh561/ State Route 561 Endpoint Photos] [[Category:State highways in Ohio|561]]
